column1: # "cheese" remix - contains everything from the fantasy cheeses/effects
# 1. Boil milk in a cauldron to obtain curd (and whey)
# 2. Place the whey in a cheese rack, in a dark place, to obtain aged cheeses. Curd and whey can
#       also be cooked in a furnace to produce a small range of cheeses
# 3. Craft stretched cheese from curd, water and salt, which produces cheeses like mozzarella. Of
#       those, caciovallo must be hanged on a string (in a dark place) before it becomes eatable
# 4. Right-click a cream centrigue with either whey or milk to produce cream
# 5. Right-click a churn with either cream or milk to produce butter
# See the STANDARDS file for more information about what belongs in each category, and what does not
